articles.content:
Toby paid a visit to the hospital after experiencing chest pains and tingling sensations in his arms (Pictures: Starnow)
It has been revealed that Emmerdale star Toby Kirkup died hours after leaving… [+1892 chars]

articles.author: Tom Brown
articles.title: Helmet may not have stopped Gaspard Ulliel fatal head injury in ski accident, investigators reveal - Daily Mail
articles.description: French actor Gaspard Ulliel died aged 37 in a skiing accident earlier this week when he collided without  a helmet with another skier in the Savoie, who gave testimony today.
articles.content: French actor Gaspard Ulliel suffered such a severe blow to the head when he crashed while skiing on Tuesday that he would probably still have died even if he wore a helmet, investigators have reveale… [+7000 chars]
